sect2.title: Installation of SPIRV-LLVM-Translator
sect2.para: Install SPIRV-LLVM-Translator by running the following commands:

screen.userinput:
mkdir build && cd build &&
cmake - DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr \ - DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \ - DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \ - DCMAKE_SKIP_INSTALL_RPATH=ON \ - DLLVM_EXTERNAL_SPIRV_HEADERS_SOURCE=/usr \ -G Ninja .. && ninja

sect2.para: This package does not come with a test suite.

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON: This parameter forces building shared versions of the libraries.

-DCMAKE_SKIP_INSTALL_RPATH=ON: This parameter forces CMake to remove hardcoded library search paths when installing a binary executable or library. This package does not need rpath once it's installed into the standard location, and leaving it can cause unexpected effects of security issues.

-DLLVM_EXTERNAL_SPIRV_HEADERS_SOURCE=/usr: This parameter allows the build system to use the version of SPIRV-Headers that was installed with SPIRV-Tools, instead of redownloading an unncessary copy of the headers.
